data.title: IBEW
data.text:
Vintage Brass Band Recordings - Compact Discs

This list provides details of some of the many such recordings made in this formats.

Information about any additional recordings not in this list will be very welcome. Please note that this list is provided for reference purposes only - it is not a stock list and no items are available for sale.

Please send any comments, additions, corrections or material to gavin@ibew.co.uk
